name: quickdrop
description: QuickDrop is a self-hosted file sharing app optimized for dropping large files across devices over local network or public access. It has a straightforward UI and supports drag-and-drop transfers.
features: Drag-and-drop uploads: Transfer files by dragging them into the browser window for instant sharing.
Large file support: Handle multi-gigabyte files without size restrictions or compression.
Local network optimization: Transfer files at full LAN speeds between devices on the same network.
Public access mode: Generate shareable links for external recipients to download files securely.
No registration required: Start sharing files immediately without creating accounts or profiles.
Mobile friendly: Upload and download files from smartphones and tablets with a touch-optimized interface.
Temporary storage: Set automatic expiration times for shared files to manage disk space.
Direct downloads: Recipients download files directly without intermediate upload services or redirects.
Progress tracking: Monitor upload and download progress with real-time speed and time estimates.
Multiple file selection: Share entire folders or multiple files in a single transfer session.
Password protection: Secure shared files with optional passwords to restrict access.
Self-hosted control: Maintain complete ownership of your data without relying on third-party services.
